content:
Hello! I am trying to invite a new member to our ZULIP chat. But it does not work. When he clicks on the invitation link he gets the message:
"Configuration error - It appears there are problems with the email configuration"
Can anybody help?
This topic was moved here from #issues > invitation does not work by Lauryn Menard.
@Vincenz - Just a heads up that I moved your message here so that folks who'll be able to help will see your message sooner.
@Vincenz Do you have outgoing email configured and working? (https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/email.html)
Are you not the person who was installing, configuring the server etc.? If so, it's best if they reach out to us here directly if they need help with setting up outgoing email
No, I'm not the person who set it up. I will have to find out who was it. Thank you!
